channel.title: I need help on this project
channel.description:
I NEED TO DUE THIS PROJECT BY THE 18TH ANYONE HELP OR INTERESTED
-You have been hired by an educational company to create computer program in Java for specific subject areas. The company has offered its employees a bonus incentive for original program development menus. The company requires you to create a page menu containing at least three different subject menu items. Each item must represent different subject area content. Examples: Math – money investment calculations - using Cosine law calculating the angle of a triangle Physics – calculating velocity and acceleration - calculating potential difference - using Ohm’s law Biology - health assessment based on the number of white blood cell count. Arts – evaluating the popularity of an exhibit based on the number of visitors coming to a gallery.
The program is expected to be interactive where the user enters chosen values to be used.

item.title: I need help on this project
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“di.doops, post:18, topic:46103”]its due on the 18th…i dont think i cud learn java in lika week
so cud any1 give me a hand with this.
thanks[/quote]

If you put in enough effort and actually got started on the project instead of trying to get others to do it for you. You basically got off your ass.

Yes you could learn how to do enough java for that project in a weekend easily.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help on this project
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

No disrespect, but this seems to me more like someone has offered you money to do this thinking you know java, when really you don’t and you just want us to do it for you.
Either that or you don’t listen in class… Your teacher would never give you an assignment like this if your just starting out

item.title: I need help on this project
item.dc:creator: @iwasinmoparseas101cl iwasinmoparseas101class
item.description:
@iwasinmoparseas101cl wrote:

-You have been hired by an educational company to create computer program in Java for specific subject areas. The company has offered its employees a bonus incentive for original program development menus. The company requires you to create a page menu containing at least three different subject menu items. Each item must represent different subject area content. Examples: Math – money investment calculations - using Cosine law calculating the angle of a triangle Physics – calculating velocity and acceleration - calculating potential difference - using Ohm’s law Biology - health assessment based on the number of white blood cell count. Arts – evaluating the popularity of an exhibit based on the number of visitors coming to a gallery.

The program is expected to be interactive where the user enters chosen values to be used.

Make a GUI using JFrame (if you don’t know…you’re fucked). Have different buttons for each section, if a button is clicked, open a new frame for thta section. then do the shizzy that you have listed in the new frame.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help on this project
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You just started java and have to do a program like that by the 18th? that is pretty rough.

Looks like you are going to spend a few long hours on your computer in the next few days, I suggest using google.com, http://www.moparisthebest.com/java/ and the sun javadocs to help you learn, and you can ask specific questions that you are having trouble with here.

Read full topic

The program is expected to be interactive where the user enters chosen values to be used.
